Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: S.L.C.
Reviews.Content: Phone was just what I wanted and less than if I had purchased it from Consumer Cellular.  Very pleased so far.

Reviews.Title: High Hopes Dashed
Reviews.Author: Better than McCarthy
Reviews.Content: With electronics, you can sometimes get a bad copy of a generally good product. I can't speak to the product in general but my phone was horrid.  Froze, erratic starts and stops.  At the end, commands took 3 1/2 minutes to execute.

Reviews.Title: Nice little phone!
Reviews.Author: Lisa in CT
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice little phone. It feels solid in your hand, is very easy to use & sounds great! Consumer Cellular is a great company too. I only left them because just having a data plan with them uses data, so you may use it up without even knowing it. Great company for calls & text though! Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Good for Consumer Cellular
Reviews.Author: Hanh Dinh
Reviews.Content: It's a good phone for Consumer Cellular. But it is LOCKED into Consumer Cellular. You cannot use it for AT&T; or other providers.If you buy an AT&T; phone instead, you could use it for Consumer Cellular. So the AT&T; phone is "backward compatible", but the Consumer Cellular phones are not.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: IRENE SARGENT
Reviews.Content: This phone is better than expected. I am still learning how to use all the features. I would recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Christian Houston
Reviews.Content: Great phone for the price, does everything I need it to. Very capable device despite the fact that it only runs android 2.2 (FroYo)

Reviews.Title: Not Fantastic, Not Terrible
Reviews.Author: Anima
Reviews.Content: I have had this product for a couple of years. It functions well enough. Sometimes it will randomly restart itself, and sometimes the camera won't open and you have to restart the phone to get it to work. More often than not games lag. However, it is a good functioning phone and I do not plan on getting a new one any time soon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Smart Phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Jim Ramey
Reviews.Content: For the cost this is an excellent 3G smart phone, especially for the money. Processor is a little slow for today's standards, but works fine. Came with micro SD card and plenty of installed apps. Would recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Sometime it restart, it self?!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Oldakowski
Reviews.Content: Some day it work great and, sometime it will restart it self?!For no reason it will restart it self!!

Reviews.Title: A great phone.
Reviews.Author: mdb
Reviews.Content: This ius a terrific phone if you don't need all the bells and whistles. I use it for making/receiving calls (amazing!), checking emails, a bit of texting. I wish the battery lasted longer before requiring a recharge -- I need to recharge every 2 or 3 days, and do not use it that much. It would probably last 4-6 hrs with constant use. Anyway, it is great for the price, and exactly what I need.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Joy R
Reviews.Content: It is a good phone. But where it said it was an fm radio, it should have stated must be with AT&T; service for this function to  be available.

Reviews.Title: A bit dated but good value
Reviews.Author: cascade hiker
Reviews.Content: If you mainly text and talk, this is a great phone.  Voices are loud and clear, reception is awesome, and the camera is OK for basic MMS and cell phone use.  The internet surfing is a bit glitchy, I think the processor is a bit stretched as the phone will occasionally lag and freeze up if you're on wifi or using the browser.  Battery life is decent if you don't use it heavily.

Reviews.Title: The phone is great!
Reviews.Author: C. Smith
Reviews.Content: this was a very good deal , it works great and is easy to use. Much cheaper than the others

Reviews.Title: 3 Weeks After Purchase I Own A Brick
Reviews.Author: JONATHAN
Reviews.Content: Phone frequently locked up, probably because it's running Froyo slooowly and I load it up with apps that all worked well on my Gingerbread. Access to battery to hard boot is not well designed and I broke the plastic clips with little effort. I must have also done something to the battery and/or contacts as it died before I could even take the battery out.The seller was 5 stars, very prompt service and shipping, and sold me exactly what was advertised. I would add them to my Trusted Seller list for future purchases. The one star in no way reflects the seller and their service

ProductInfo.Features:
3.7-inch colorful touchscreen display
Perfect messaging phone with virtual Qwerty touch pad
3-megapixel digital camera/camcorder with digital zoom
Memory slot expandable to 32 GB
Android 2.2 operating system
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola MB520 Bravo Smartphone Prepaid Phone (Consumer Cellular, Locked) Android OS, 3MP Camera, FM Radio
